question: Tom went to the zoo yesterday. What did he visit?
Mary bought apples and bananas. What did she buy besides apples?
Ken read a book before bed. When did he read?
Sara likes dogs, but she has a cat. What pet does she have?
The movie starts at seven. When does it start?
John plays soccer every weekend. What sport does he play?
They went hiking on Sunday. What did they do?
Alice studied math for two hours. What subject did she study?
My father cooked dinner last night. Who cooked dinner?
The train arrived late. How did it arrive?
